binanceTrApi package¶

binanceTrApi.BinanceTrService module¶

class binanceTrApi.BinanceTrService.ApiService(apiKey, apiSecret)¶

Bases: object

ApiServiceClass Object

Parameters

  • apiKey(str) – Given account’s api key.

  • apiSecret(str) – Given account’s api secret key.

cancelOrderById(orderID)¶

Cancellation order by Id.

Parameters

orderID(str) – Unique orderid taken from BinanceTr.

Returns

(json) Return requested value from api.

getAccountInformation()¶

Get account information.

Returns

(json) Return requested value from api.

getAggregateTrades(symbol, startDate=None, endDate=None, limit=50)¶

Get recent trades of given parity from market in given dates.

Parameters

  • symbol(str) – Coin name with parity. ex. BTC_TRY

  • startDate(str) – Start date. ex.(5 min ago, 4 hour ago)

  • endDate(str) – End date. ex.(5 min ago, 4 hour ago)

  • limit(int) – Number of recent trades to be returned.

Returns

(json) Return requested value from api.

getAllOpenBuyOrders(symbol, limit=500)¶

Get all open buy orders from account.

Parameters

  • symbol(str) – Coin name with parity. ex. BTC_TRY.

  • limit(int) – Give the limit to see how many order will be shown.

Returns

(json) Return requested value from api.

  • startDate(str) – Start date. ex.(5 min ago, 4 hour ago)

  • endDate(str) – End date. ex.(5 min ago, 4 hour ago)

  • limit(int) – Number of recent trades to be returned.

postBuyMarketOrder(symbol, origQuantity)¶

Post buy market order from account.

Parameters

  • symbol(str) – Coin name with parity. ex. BTC_TRY.

  • origQuoteQuantity(float) – Quantity of coin for the order.

Returns

(json) Return requested value from api.

postNewLimitOrder(symbol, side, origQuoteQuantity, price)¶

Post new limit order from account.

Parameters

  • symbol(str) – Coin name with parity. ex. BTC_TRY.

  • side(str) – BUY or SELL, usage with uppercase “BUY” “SELL”.

  • origQuoteQuantity(float) – Quantity of coin for the order.

  • float) (price(int,) – Price count.

Returns

(json) Return requested value from api.

postSellMarketOrder(symbol, origQuoteQuantity)¶

Parameters

  • symbol(str) – Coin name with parity. ex. BTC_TRY.

  • origQuoteQuantity(float) – Quantity of coin for the order.

Returns

(json) Return requested value from api.

postStopLimitOrder(symbol, side, origQuoteQuantity, limitPrice, stopPrice)¶

Post stop limit orders from account.

Parameters

  • symbol(str) – Coin name with parity. ex. BTC_TRY.

  • side(str) – BUY or SELL, usage with uppercase “BUY” “SELL”.

  • origQuoteQuantity(float) – Quantity of coin for the order.

  • float) (stopPrice(int,) – Limit price count.

  • float) – Stop price count.

Returns

(json) Return requested value from api.
